isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9800 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - SUN VISOR AND CLIP

svcprocinfo.para: There are three sun visors above the windshield, one for the driver, one for the passenger and one in the center, mounted the same as the driver's sun visor.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Driver and Passenger Sun Visors
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 30 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If equipped with a lighted mirror (Item 1), remove the "A" pillar cover (Item 2) and disconnect electrical connector behind "A" pillar cover.
Remove mounting screws (Item 5) securing sun visor support bracket (Item 6) to cab header.
Disengage sun visor assembly (Item 3) from sun visor clip (Item 4). Remove sun visor assembly.
Remove mounting screws (Item 7) securing sun visor clip (Item 4) to cab header. Remove sun visor clip.
Disengage center sun visor assembly (Item 8) from sun visor clip (Item 9).
Remove mounting screws (Item 10) securing center sun visor support bracket (Item 11) to cab header. Remove sun visor assembly (Item 8).
Remove mounting screws (Item 12) securing sun visor clip (Item 9) to cab header. Remove sun visor clip.

svcsubproc.title: Install Driver and Passenger Sun Visors
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 30 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position sun visor clip (Item 4) on cab header and secure with mounting screws (Item 7).
Engage sun visor assembly (Item 3) into sun visor clip (Item 4).
Position sun visor assembly (Item 3) in place on cab header, secure sun visor support bracket (Item 6) with mounting screws (Item 5).
Connect electrical connector in "A" pillar and install "A" pillar cover (Item 2).
Position sun visor clip (Item 9) on cab header and secure with mounting screws (Item 12).
Engage center sun visor assembly (Item 8) into the visor clip (Item 9).
Position center sun visor assembly (Item 8) in place on cab header, secure center sun visor support bracket (Item 11) with mounting screws (Item 10).
